name: Social Places
short_description:
Social Places is designed to optimize access to the mobile device to web services and social networks in particular to location services.

The main purpose of project is to provide access to data and location info from various Internet services, and build a user interface with a focus on mobile devices with touch screens. The project uses Musson libraries and frameworks. 

The project is supported by grant KA179 of Karelia ENPI programme, http://kareliaenpi.eu/
summary: Provide access to places from social networks
